verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. Deliver <S%H2502><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, from the evil <S%H7451><s%> man <S%H376><s%>; Preserve <S%H5341><s%> me from the violent <S%H2555><s%> man <S%H376><s%>:
Who devise <S%H2803><s%> mischiefs <S%H7451><s%> in their heart <S%H3820><s%>; Continually <S%H3117><s%> do they gather themselves together <S%H1481><s%> for war <S%H4421><s%>.
They have sharpened <S%H8150><s%> their tongue <S%H3956><s%> like a serpent <S%H5175><s%>; Adders <S%H5919><s%>' poison <S%H2534><s%> is under their lips <S%H8193><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

Keep <S%H8104><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, from the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>; Preserve <S%H5341><s%> me from the violent <S%H2555><s%> man <S%H376><s%>: Who have purposed <S%H2803><s%> to thrust <S%H1760><s%> aside my steps <S%H6471><s%>.

The proud <S%H1343><s%> have hid <S%H2934><s%> a snare <S%H6341><s%> for me <S%H2256><s%>, and cords; They have spread <S%H6566><s%> a net <S%H7568><s%> by the wayside <S%H3027><s%>; They have set <S%H7896><s%> gins <S%H4170><s%> for me <S%H5542><s%>. [[Selah
I said <S%H559><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Thou art my God <S%H410><s%>: Give ear <S%H238><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

O Jehovah <S%H3069><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%>, the strength <S%H5797><s%> of my salvation <S%H3444><s%>, Thou hast covered <S%H5526><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle <S%H5402><s%>.

Grant <S%H5414><s%> not <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, the desires <S%H3970><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>; Further <S%H6329><s%> not his evil device <S%H2162><s%>, lest they exalt <S%H7311><s%> themselves <S%H5542><s%>. [[Selah
As for the head <S%H7218><s%> of those that compass me about <S%H4524><s%>, Let the mischief <S%H5999><s%> of their own lips <S%H8193><s%> cover them <S%H3680><s%>.
Let burning coals <S%H1513><s%> fall <S%H4131><s%> upon them <S%H5307><s%>: Let them be cast into the fire <S%H784><s%>, Into deep pits <S%H4113><s%>, whence they shall not rise <S%H6965><s%>.

An evil speaker <S%H376><s%> shall not be established <S%H3559><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>: Evil <S%H7451><s%> shall hunt <S%H6679><s%> the violent <S%H2555><s%> man <S%H376><s%> to overthrow him <S%H4073><s%>.
I know <S%H3045><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will maintain <S%H6213><s%> the cause <S%H1779><s%> of the afflicted <S%H6041><s%>, And justice <S%H4941><s%> for the needy <S%H34><s%>.
Surely the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto thy name <S%H8034><s%>: The upright <S%H3477><s%> shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in thy presence <S%H6440><s%>.
